name: Colorless Life
description: This game is dynamic story about man's struggle with himself. From your actions depends the outcome of this struggle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp Processor: Intel core i3 Graphics: GTX 780 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 85 MB available space Sound Card: DEXP 4.0 PCI
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel core i5 Graphics: GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: ASUS Xonar D2/PM
